amendatorysection.catchline: Cities of the metropolitan class; city council; terms; districts; qualifications.
amendatorysection.para: In a city of the metropolitan class, seven council members shall be elected to the city council for terms of four years at the general city election in 1993 pursuant to section 14-201. One council member shall be nominated and elected from each of the districts into which the city is divided pursuant to section 14-201.03. The council members shall meet the qualifications found in sections 14-204 and 14-230.
